<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Giant's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=149) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 91 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[giant instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=4)

**Requirements**
You are Medium or smaller.

</column>

---

You grow to incredible size. You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) condition until you stop raging. Your equipment grows with you.

<title level="2">Giant's Stature leads to...</title>
[Titan's Stature](/Feats.aspx?ID=166)
name: Giant's Stature
